resources.string:
This game is realy easy to understand
you have six levels with 10 words by level. In each level you have a precise number of try and a precise number of letter to each word.
The level 1 is easiest than the level 2 and so onâ€¦
Level l : 10 tries and each word has 3 letters
level 2 : 8 tries and each word has 4 letters
and so on until
level 6 = 1 tries and each word has 8 letters
Enjoy !
